paragraphs.name: c7c1
paragraphs.text: You can live a life of ingratitude where you spend all of your money, or you can live a life of service where you invest it in yourself and others. Your choice.

paragraphs.name: 30be
paragraphs.text: Now I know that I’m nobody unless I’m helping somebody. This isn’t a bad thing, despite what you see on social media. I simply don’t care about being seen anymore. I’m happy being invisible or visible.
You can live a life of ingratitude where you spend all of your money, or you can live a life of service where you invest it in yourself and others. Your choice.
paragraphs.name: c7c1
12ea
paragraphs.text: When you build it based on how much you contribute to other people’s lives, you feel full, even when the money isn’t there yet. I think it’s what people call purpose.

paragraphs.name: 30be
paragraphs.text: Now I know that I’m nobody unless I’m helping somebody. This isn’t a bad thing, despite what you see on social media. I simply don’t care about being seen anymore. I’m happy being invisible or visible.

paragraphs.name: 72f7
paragraphs.text: I became happier when I focused on being a decent human being. Helping others something I do because it is my nature. Helping people does not make you any happier because you share their problems along with their success. I don’t know how to get happy. I live my life rightly and am grateful that I have moments of happiness. Due to illness, I may…
